content: copyright of this pattern will always remain with me i with a crochet hook work one round of single am providing this pattern for personal home use crochet it will keep the bodice tight and much only you may make garments from it as gifts or neater looking donate to charities and fundraisers commercial use of this pattern is a violation of the copyright selling weave in any lose ends products made from this pattern or distributing this you can leave the dress as is at this point or sew on pattern in any manner is prohibited under the any decorative buttons or appliques copyright unless i elena nodel have granted express written permission acknowledgments contact information  heartfelt thanks and my deepest gratitude go to my wonderful group of testers whose hard work and most valuable input made this pattern possible email elenanodel@gmail com ravelry username anadiomena ravelry group http //www ravelry com/groups/anadiomenas- adventures blog http //anadiomenadesigns blogspot com etsy http //anadiomena etsy com facebook http //www facebook com/anadiomenasdesigns twitter http //twitter com/anadiomenasdesi © elena nodel 2009
